name: Google Slides
natural_language_description: 这是 Google Slides 节点。主要用于: Consume the Google Slides API

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: oAuth2

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: presentation

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get
available_options: Get Thumbnail (值: getThumbnail) - Get a thumbnail

title.name: title
title.description: Title of the presentation to create
title.natural_language_description: 参数名: Title | 作用: Title of the presentation to create | (必填项)

presentationId.name: presentationId
presentationId.description: ID of the presentation to retrieve. Found in the presentation URL: `https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/PRESENTATION_ID/edit`
presentationId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Presentation ID | 作用: ID of the presentation to retrieve. Found in the presentation URL: `https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/PRESENTATION_ID/edit` | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

pageObjectId.name: pageObjectId
pageObjectId.description: ID of the page object to retrieve
pageObjectId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Page Object ID | 作用: ID of the page object to retrieve | (必填项)

textUi.name: textUi
textUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Texts To Replace | 默认值: {}

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: revisionId (值: None) - The revision ID of the presentation required for the write request. If specified and the requiredRevisionId doesn't exactly match the presentation's current revisionId, the request will not be processed and will return a 400 bad request error.

download.name: download
download.description: Name of the binary property to which to write the data of the read page
download.natural_language_description: 参数名: Download | 作用: Name of the binary property to which to write the data of the read page | 默认值: False

binaryProperty.name: binaryProperty
binaryProperty.natural_language_description: 参数名: Put Output File in Field | 提示: The name of the output binary field to put the file in | 默认值: data | (必填项)
